news.title: Maintenance Release for 2004.3
news.summary: The Release Engineering Project has put out a maintenance release for some architectures. This release includes only a very few changes in the release media and as such does not contain new features.

body.p: The Release Engineering Project has put out a maintenance release for some architectures. This release includes only a very few changes in the release media and as such does not contain new features.
Updated release media are available for:

ul.li: alpha: New LiveCD with correct aboot.conf; stages and LiveCD are now in the releases/ directory

amd64 and x86: New LiveCD with corrected Speakup support, pnpbios is now turned off by default, and the source code for dhcpcd, slocate, usbutils and pciutils is now added to the Universal LiveCD. The x86 Package CD is also rebuild due to a missing glib dependency on kdegraphics
hppa: New LiveCD with LVM2 support

body.p: You can find the maintenance release media in the same location as the 2004.3 release media on your favorite Gentoo mirror.
